newsitem.title: USA: Cable Design July sales about $41 mln.
newsitem.headline: Cable Design July sales about $41 mln.

text.p: Cable Design Technologies Corp said Tuesday it had record July sales of about $41 million, about 160 percent over last year's July sales.
The company said several acquisitions over the last year contributed to the improvement.
The company said the strong July sales have helped to mitigate the unfavorable impact of the decline in copper prices reported June 26.
The Company said it expects results for its fourth fiscal quarter to be in the upper range of analysts' estimates.
